title: The Decay of Lying - "Enjoy nature! I am glad..."

content.prompt: Vivian's first words ("Enjoy nature! I am glad to say that I have entirely lost that faculty") are surprising because Vivian

choices.label: claims to enjoy having lost something that he obviously still possesses
implies that enjoying nature and smoking are not incongruous

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain the function of contrasting characters.
